text: How gold has tarnished! Even pure gold has lost its shine! Jewels from the Temple4:1. “Jewels from the Temple”: literally, “holy stones.” These could also refer to the stones from which the Temple was constructed, but in the context of things of value it seems more likely that they refer to the jewels used to decorate the Temple, or even those from the High Priest's clothing. have been scattered on every street corner.
